about.title: Hi there!
about.description_p_one: My name is Maryna. In 2017, I created the brand mariam crochet jewelry.
about.description_p_two: Website mariam corner is my small universe that follows the philosophy of healing through beauty. It also nurtures a sense of tenderness, attention to details, and enthusiasm for handmade creations.
about.description_p_three: Everything I do is object poetry, a visual dance of joy. In each piece, you can feel the beat of my heart and a particle of my of soul, that I want to share with you!
about.description_ending: I am sincerely happy for every meeting, and with great love, I will create beauty for you!

footer.quote: «Hands weave what the heart sings.»
